attributes.action: Cancel the funding of training for Muslim clerics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC says "Tony Blair has launched a £1m project to fund the training of Muslim clerics in the UK - allowing Britain to move away from reliance on overseas ministers who may not speak English."

As a taxpayer, I object to my money being used to fund the training of Muslim clerics - or any other religious leader.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
